alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Collier and northwestern Hendry Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 500 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Port La Belle to near Felda to 7 miles southeast of Lehigh Acres. Movement was northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Labelle, Felda, Port La Belle and Keri. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
